title: Citi Leaders Named to American Banker's 2017 "Most Powerful Women" Lists
summary: Today, American Banker magazine announced its 2017 "Most Powerful Women in Banking and Finance" lists. Once again, Citi made a strong showing with several talented leaders honored. All of these talented honorees are not just vital to our businesses - they are also among the most respected executives in our industry and play an integral role in our businesses and communities. Congratulations to all on this wonderful honor, we are fortunate and very proud to have them at Citi.
